review: We have had it for over two years now and we are still using it for our basement TV. Works great, never had issue streaming Netflix and Youtube.
author: J.J.

review: Great product, practical and easy to install.

review: Incompatible with too many files to make it very useful.

review: its a bit slow and from time to time I have to restart it. but works for what I need it  mostly: Netflix.

review: Good device, but it does not work without internet access, so I have my home wireless network and  I can not use it!
author: Jonathan Sarabia "Jonas"

review: this didn't work well with my wifi I have a decent speed internet and it wOuld not work worth certain apps and would delay connections... much more cost effective just connecting your phone through a line instead
